description: All the code to generate the figures in the paper Petrucco et al, 'Neural dynamics and architecture of the heading direction circuit in a vertebrate brain' (https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2022.04.27.489672v1). The README.md contains a complete description of the content.
title: Petrucco et al, Neural dynamics and architecture of the heading direction circuit in a vertebrate brain [Code]
